events.message: I received my order last week but the product is not what I expected. I want to return it and get a refund.
The customer's message includes keywords related to refunds and returns, categorizing this case under Refund.
Assigning this refund case to the returns department for further processing and customer assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return your product and get a refund. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process the refund promptly?
My order number is 123456789. The item looked different in the pictures and I’m unhappy with the quality, so I want my money back.
Thank you for the details. We can arrange for a return shipping label to be sent to you today and will process your refund as soon as we receive the item.
That sounds good, I appreciate your quick response and help in resolving this issue.
We have sent you the return label via email. Please send the product back at your earliest convenience and once received, we will issue your refund immediately.
Just following up to ensure you received the return label and to check if you need any additional assistance with your refund process.
Since the refund has been processed and the issue is resolved, we are closing this case. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
